text: Halsey and G - Eazy's breakup is officially the most confusing thing about Summer 2018, other than — of course — the fact that everyone's collectively decided it's totally normal to get engaged after a month of dating. But back to Halsey and G - Eazy! The pair announced their split several weeks ago, and since then fans have been speculating that G - Eazy cheated on his ex. Mostly because Halsey tweeted 1 ) A scissors emoji which is a possible reference to G - Eazy's lyrics, ` ` Ever catch me cheating, she would try to cut my d * ck off,'' and 2 ) the words ` ` pumpkin eater,'' which is a possible reference to the rhyme ` ` cheater
